ai.grakn.client

Class LoaderClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • ai.grakn.client.LoaderClient

  • public class LoaderClient
extends Object
    Client to load qraql queries into Grakn. Provides methods to batch insert queries. Optionally can provide a consumer that will execute when a batch finishes loading. LoaderClient will block when the configured resources are being used to execute tasks.
    Author:
    alexandraorth

    • Method Detail

      • setRetryPolicy

        public LoaderClient setRetryPolicy(boolean retry)
        Tell the LoaderClient if it should retry sending tasks when the Engine server is not available
        Parameters:
        retry - boolean representing if engine should retry

      • setTaskCompletionConsumer

        public LoaderClient setTaskCompletionConsumer(Consumer<mjson.Json> onCompletionOfTask)
        Provide a consumer function to execute upon task completion
        Parameters:
        onCompletionOfTask - function applied to the last state of the task

      • setBatchSize

        public LoaderClient setBatchSize(int size)
        Set the size of the each transaction in terms of number of vars.
        Parameters:
        size - number of vars in each transaction

      • getBatchSize

        public int getBatchSize()
        Get the number of queries in each transaction
        Returns:
        the batch size

      • setNumberActiveTasks

        public LoaderClient setNumberActiveTasks(int size)
        Number of active tasks running on the server at any one time. Consider this a safeguard on system load. The Loader add(InsertQuery) method will block on the value of this field.
        Parameters:
        size - number of tasks to allow to run at any given time

      • add

        public void add(InsertQuery query)
        Add an insert query to the queue. This method will block while the number of currently executing tasks is equal to the set blockerSize which can be set with setNumberActiveTasks(int). It will become unblocked as tasks are completed.
        Parameters:
        query - insert query to be executed

      • flush

        public void flush()
        Load any remaining batches in the queue.

      • waitToFinish

        public void waitToFinish()
        Wait for all of the submitted tasks to have been completed
